description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Burgers With Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lamb Burgers With Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place patties on prepared tray, and cover each with two slices of cheese. Bake for 10 minutes or until patties are cooked through. Spread 1 tbs hummus on each roll base, top with each with a pattie, tomato, lettuce, coleslaw and roll top. Serve remaining coleslaw on the side.
